DESCRIPTION: Sigils are normally unplayable cards which are played when they are discarded from your hand.
Spend [E] to deal 30 [${ModID}:ForceIcon] damage to a random enemy.
Activated relics do not have a passive effect. They have an effect when their button is clicked.
Cards with an activate effect let you trigger that effect when you wish. They have a clickable button to the left of the energy orb.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn.
Ringing creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

When you play a Resonant card it is returned to your hand at the start of your next turn. When you play multiple Resonant cards in one turn all of their effects are combined into a single card; that card is returned as normal. Returned cards always cost 1.
Whenever a creature with Frostbite attacks it takes damage and Frostbite is reduced by 1.
Flanked creatures lose HP whenever they are attacked.
Whenever a Jinxed creature receives another debuff, it loses HP.
